page.title: 18Shops and Post Offices
page.content: With our block being an important tourist and retirement area, shops and Post Offices provide a very important service. Our local sub-Post Office performs many different services.It sells stamps, pays out pensions, takes payment of T.V. licences, electricity and gas bills, provides a banking service , sells budget stamps of many sorts to help pay bills, and Postal Orders so that money can be sent through the post. Supermarkets are important for food shopping for both tourists and residents. There are four main supermarkets in New Milton, Safeway, Co-op, International and Shoppers Paradise. We compared the prices of an average shopping basket for the four shops and found the prices very much the same, about Â£25.
